note: I'm a writer and photographer who has traveled a lot. Met a lot of film stars and wandered around a lot of movies. Talked to a few American Presidents and other world leaders. Been places like Syria and N Korea and Afghanistan and Iraq and Gaza Strip. Andes. Himalayas. Alps. Scottish Hills. Urals. American and Canadian Rockies. Kayaked down the Yukon and Yangtze and other major rivers. Done quite a few deserts
